entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as refusing to speak to Harry and Ron. She is also referred to as a 'bossy know-it-all'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is mentioned as being interested in seeing what was in the large parcel.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned alongside Harry as someone who saw Hermione's refusal to speak to them as an added bonus.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is the target of Harry and Ron's desire for revenge. He is not physically present in the scene but is mentioned as a person they want to get back at.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is described as where everyone's attention was caught by the long thin package carried by six large screech owls.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are in conflict as evidenced by her refusal to speak to him. This is described as a bonus for Harry and Ron.
